comments: Capela (ATL) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Siakam (TOR) and absorbs the contact.
Flynn (TOR) makes marginal contact with Goodwin's (ATL) arm during his side to side movement on the perimeter.
Flynn (TOR) cleanly dislodges the ball from Goodwin (ATL) during his drive.
Siakam (TOR) takes fewer than three steps after he has gathered the ball.
Huerter (ATL) legally contests Boucher (TOR) jump shot attempt.
Bogdanovic (ATL) leaves the designated throw-in spot when he slides his foot.
Hill (ATL) engages and disengages with Siakam (TOR) prior to the inbounds pass.
Huerter (ATL) places his hand to Siakam's (TOR) front at the start of his drive and affects his SQBR.
Siakam (TOR) swipes down and makes contact with Bogdanovic's (ATL) arm that affects his control of the ball in the backcourt.
Siakam (TOR) commits a take foul on Goodwin (ATL).
Hill (ATL) gives Flynn (TOR) room to land on the jump shot attempt.
Anunoby (TOR) commits a take foul on Goodwin (ATL).
Hill (ATL) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Siakam (TOR) as he keeps his arms vertical and absorbs the contact.
Anunoby (TOR) briefly grasps Huerter's (ATL) jersey during the screen and does not affect his ability to defend.
Flynn (TOR) makes incidental contact to Capela's (ATL) body as he attempts to get to the loose ball during the rebound.
Anunoby (TOR) commits a take foul on Goodwin (ATL).
